price: 23. Kaadu sinni yallitteh qibaadá macabina sittak iyyen, kaadu Waddiiy, Suwaaqaay, Yaqhusuuy, Yaquuqh kee Nasri deqsitta numtinwellitteh qibaadá macabina sittak iyyen.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lā tadharunna ālihatakum walā tadharunna waddan walā suwāʿan walā yaghūtha wayaʿūqa wanasran
